charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CT 1: Ord tht the dft shall pay to the U.S. a total fine of $25,000.00, which shall be interest as provided by law. Dft comm to the cust of BOP for a term of 90 mos. Upon release frm imprisonment, the dft shall be placed on supv release for a te rm of 5 yrs, under the rules &; reg of the PO &; GO 318; dft shall comply w/rules &; reg of the INS; Ord tht dft pay a s/a of $50.00 to the U.S. The crt notifies the dft of his right to appeal.
